import React, { Component } from 'react' import Layout from '../../Components/Layout' import {Link} from '../../routes' import {Form, Button, Input} from 'semantic-ui-react' class newCandidate extends Component{ state = { name : '', partyName : '', Loading : false, errorMessage } render(){ return( Homepage
this.setState({name : event.target.value})} /> this.setState({partyName : event.target.value})} />
) } } export default newCandidate
